dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright images]
dmca.body:
-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] copyright images
Date: Thu, 23 Sep 2004 16:18:43 -0400
From: Infopro <infopro@infoprosjoint.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello,
I'm contacting you today to see what we can do about a person on your server
that's stolen graphics from my website.
Here's the website that's using my images.
http://grannysplace.4.forumer.com/index.php
I tried to contact the host of this forum, but that's a total waste of time.

Here is my website where the graphics were stolen from.
http://forums.infoprosjoint.net/index.php?

I came across this when I saw the bandwidth usage and tracked it to this
site. After implementing some re write rules into my .htaccess I was able to
effectively block the use of the images as had been going on.
Now they've come and grabbed the images right off the site and placed them
on your server.

I would like these images removed from your server immediately.
The list of images.
http://4.forumer.com/html/emoticons/grannysplace/forum_new.gif
http://4.forumer.com/html/emoticons/grannysplace/forum_old.gif
http://4.forumer.com/html/emoticons/grannysplace/thread%20on%20new.gif
http://4.forumer.com/html/emoticons/grannysplace/thread_hot_new.gif
http://4.forumer.com/html/emoticons/grannysplace/thread_hot.gif
http://4.forumer.com/html/emoticons/grannysplace/poll_new.gif
http://4.forumer.com/html/emoticons/grannysplace/thread%20on%20new.gif
http://4.forumer.com/html/emoticons/grannysplace/thread_lock.gif

Thank you for your prompt assistance with this.

Chuck Wadlow
http://infoprosjoint.net





-- 
Thanks,
Garrett White
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
